column2: TSpykhu Khuefashchekhem Teukhua Duneipso Dzhepsale
Duneipso Keral Zegukhenygem (DKZ) i Zekhuesym egepur;
Duneipso tspykhugem kykhiubyde detkhene zy tspykhuri zegukhenygeri;
my dzhepsaler sytym shchygui ya negum shchpageture myby kyshchykheshch tspykhu khuefashchekhemre khuitynygekhemre ya nepe zerytragetym, khuashchp lytenygem egedzhenyge-gesenyge guegukpe zrageuzhynu;

khegegu kpuetspkhemi duneipsomi kpuekhukpe nekhri zyshchyzuzh amalkher zykhuageshchkhepeure my zegukhenygeshkhuem khet keralkhem ezym ya lepkkheri, ya unafem shchpaget negueshchp keralkhem ya lepkkheri kyzeshchpiubydeu, duneipsom i dene shchpyppi my tspykhu khuefashchekhemre khuitynygekhemre leshchu shchyzragekpuenym, kyshchashchtenym, shchagezeshchpenym khushchpekunkheu,
tspykhu khuefashchekhem teukhuaue zhylaguekhemi lepkkhemi ya zekhuede ideal shchapkhekher kezygeuv my duneipso dzhepsaler.
1-ne pychygue
TSpykhu psori shchkhekhuitu, ya shchpykhymre ya khuefashchekhemrekpe zekhuedeu kalkhur. Akylre zekheshchpykp guazere yapeshchi, zyr zym zekuesh zekhashchIe yaku delu zekhushchytyn khueikheshch.
2-ne pychygue

Detkhene zy tspykhuri zekhuedeu khuitshch my dzhepsalem khet tsIykhu khuefashchekhemre khuitynygekhemre zykhuigeshchkhepenu, zyshchyshch rasem, i fem, tspykhubz-tspykhukhuu zeryshchytym, i bzem, ipyg dinym, politichne e negueshchp eplykpeu ipem, lepkyu e tspykhu gupu kyzykhekpam, mylkuu ipem, kyshchalkhua-kyzdalkhuam emylytaue zekhegezhynsheu, khuegekpuetenygensheu.

Kinemyshchpaue, keral shchkhekhuiti, negueshchpym i unafe shchpeti, shchkhekhuityzhnyge (avtonomie) zimypi, negueshchpu zy shchkhekhuitynyge lakhe zyteli, syt khuederei keralym i tspykhuu shchytmi detkhene zy tspykhum zekhegezhnyge khuashchp khunukym zyshchyshch keralym i politichne e yuridicheske sisteme e duneipso keralkhem ya zekhuakum shchipe statusym kykhekpyu.
3-ne pychygue
Pseunyr, shchkhekhuitynyr, shynaguenshager kheti i khuefashcheshch.
4-ne pychygue
Kheti pshchylpyu plyte e pshchpylpyppe ibget khunukym, syt khuede shchpykpeui pshchylpyger, pshchylp shchen-keshchekhunyr zymi khuebde mykhunu kuedyshch.
5-ne pychygue
Kheti leshchyge epkhelpe khunukym, zalymygekpe, tspykhugem kemyzegu e i naper zygeuliin khuedekpe udezekpue, apkhuede tezyr teplkhe khunukym.
6-ne pychygue
Kheti khuefashcheshch dene shchpyppi tspykhuu, yuridicheske litsoue kyshchalytenu.
7-ne pychygue

Detkhene zy tspykhuri keral khabzem i pashchkhe shchyzekhuedeshch ikpi keral khabzem  kekhumenygekher zekhegezhynsheu, ya zekhuedeu zykhuageshchkhepenu khuitshch.  zekhegezhynsheu, zekhuedeu khuefashcheshch my dzhepsalem kemyzeg, zekhegezh zykhel IuekhushchIafekhemi, apkhuede IuekhushchIafem syt khuedeui tegegushkhuenmi kyshchakhumenu.
8-ne pychygue

Detkhene zy tspykhum khuitynyge iIeshch khabze nekhyshchkhem e keral khabzem kyripes tsIykhu khuefashchekher zykute IuekhushchIafe kyshchykhukIe khuitynyge ziIe kheyashchIekhem zykhuigezenu, zykrigekhumenu.
9-ne pychygue
Detkhene zy tspykhuri lazhe imyIeu yaubyd, yagetIys e egezygekIe negueshchI shchIypIe yakhu khunukym.
10-ne pychygue

Detkhene zy tspykhumi khuitynyge iIeshch i khuefashchekher, i khuitynygekher shchaubzykhukIe ikIi ezym zy lazhe kyshchytralkhekIe zymi fIemylIykI, zymi i unafem shchIemyt,  imytelkhe kheyashchIe shchkhekhuit psekhuityr zakhuagekIe ikIi nakhueue i Iuekhum irigeplynu khueinu.
11-ne pychygue

Zy lazhe/shchIapkhedzhage zytralkhe detkhene zy tsIykhuri ziukhiizhyn  zykhuenykuenu shynaguenshagekher zyshchiguetynu kheishchIegu nakhuem i kIeukhyu, keral khabzem tetu yagekuanshekhunkIe kheiue kalyter, mykheife kraplyrkym.

Kheti yagekuanshe khunukym, shchishchIem shchygue keral khabzekIe e Duneipso khabzekIe shchIepkhedzhageu yamybzha zy Iuekhu zerishchIam e ishchIapkheu kashchykhu  zerimyshchIam shchkhekIe. Kheti shchIapkhedzhage shchishchIam shchygue khuegeuvau shchyta tezyrym nekhybe tralkhe khunukym.
12-ne pychygue

Detkhene zy tspykhum i gashchIe uneim, i unaguem, i unem e zeryzeryshchIe shchIykIekhem shchkheusyguensheu zyri kykhezerykh khunukym, i napem, i tsIem keIuse  Kheti khuitynyge iIeshch mypkhuede kykhezerykhnygekhem keral khabzekIe zykshchyrigekhumenu.
13-ne pychygue
Detkhene zy tspykhum khuitynyge iIeshch detkhene zy kerali i shchIynalem shchkhekhuitu shchyzekIuenu, shchypseunu.
Detkhene zy tspykhum khuitynyge iIeshch ezy i keralri khetu detkhene zy keralym iIepkhukIynu ikIi shchIeryshchIeu nigezezhynu.
14-ne pychygue
Detkhene zy tspykhum khuitynyge iIeshch zalymyge/lei kyshchrakhym i shchkher negueshchI keral irigezynu, shchkheegeznyge amalkher zykhuigeshchkhepenu.

Aue pezhypeu politichneu shchymyt shchIepkhedzhagekhem e Duneipso keral zegukham i murad, i bzypkhe kemyzeg IuekhushchIafekhem kykhekI dauedapshchekhem shchygue my khuitynyger zykhuebgeshchkhepe khunukym.
15-ne pychygue
Detkhene zy tspykhum khuitynyge iIeshch zy keralym i tsIykhuu shchytynu.
Detkhene zy tspykhur zitsIykhuu shchyt keralym shchkheusyguensheu khebgekI e negueshchI keralym i tsIykhu khunu iIe khuitynygem khebgen khunukym.
16-ne pychygue

Zi nybzh irikua detkhene zy tspykhukhumi tsIykhubzmi khuitynyge iIeshch kyzykhekIa lepkym, zi tsIykhuu shchyt keralym e dinu iIygym kykhekI peryuegu kykhuemyuvu, khuitu kishenu, dekIuenu, unague iukhuenu.
Zeryshen-zedekIuenym teukhua zezegnyger (nechykhyr), zeryshenu-zedekIuenukhem ezym ya shchkhekhuitynyge pezhre ya fIefInyge ikurekIe yaukhuer.
Unaguer, zhylague-lepk pseukIem i labzhe nekhyshchkheshchi, zhylemi keralmi kekhumer.
17-ne pychygue
Detkhene zy tspykhum khuitynyge iIeshch ezym i uneiue e negueshchIkher iIekheguue mylku zrigeIenu.
Detkhene zy tsIykhur shchkheusyguensheu i mylku peIeshchIe e lymyIesyf pshchIy khunukym.
18-ne pychygue

Detkhene zy tspykhum gupsyse, zekhashchIe ikIi din khuitynyge iIeshch. My khuitynygem kyzeshchIeubyder i zakueu e gupu, nakhueu e uneiue (shchekhuu) i tkhekhueIueryshchIenkher, i dinkIe shchIapkhekher nerylaguu yarigeshchIen, igezeshchIen khuitynygeri.
19-ne pychygue

Detkhene zy tspykhum khuitynyge iIeshch zerykhueiue gupsysenu, i gupsysekher kiIuetenu. My khuitynygem khetshch tsIykhur i gupsysekhem kykhekIkIe zymi kimygegumeshchIynu, keralygue gunapkekhem emylytaue shchIenygekher, gupsysekher syt khuederei guegukIi kekhuten-kepshchyten, zyIerygekhen khuitynygeri.
20-ne pychygue
Kheti khuitynyge iIeshch Ieshchensheu, zaue-banensheu zekhuesynu, khase iukhuenu, ukhua khasem khykhenu.
Kheti zy khase khykhenu ebgez khunukym.
21-ne pychygue
Detkhene zy tspykhum khuitynyge iIeshch zanshchIeu ezym e khuitu kykhikha i lIykIuekhem ya IekIe keralym i zegekIuen Iuekhukhem khykhenu, kheIebenu.
Detkhene zy tspykhum khuitynyge ipeshch i keralym tspykhubem kykhuzerigepeshch amalkher zekhegezhynsheu, psom khuedeu zykhuigeshchkhepenu.

Khykumet peshchkhetetnygem i labzher keralym i tspykhubem i fIeiguenygershch. A fpeiguenyger utyku kokher shchekhu shchpykpem tet khekhynyge khuit zakhuekheu e tspykhukhem ya fpeiguenygekher shchkhekhuit-psekhuitu kyzerageleguefynu gepsa negueshchp shchpykpekheu, zi nybzh irikua tspykhu psomi yakhuzepukhaue, ya pepetkhemi zekhuede guashchpe yapeue, ppale genekhuakpe kytragezezhkhemkpe.
22-ne pychygue

TSpykhube zhylaguem zeryshchyshchym elytaue detkhene zy tspykhum khuefashcheshch sotsialne kekhumenyge. Keral guashchpekpe e keralyguekhem ya zedepepykunygekpe ikpi detkhene zy keralym ezym i gepsykpemre i amalkhemre elytaue detkhene zy tspykhum khuitynyge ipeshch i napere i tspykhugerekpe tynshu zeryziuzhynu ekonomike, sotsialne ikpi shchpenkhabze puekhukpe zykhuenykuenu amalkher irageguetynu.
23-ne pychygue
Detkhene zy tspykhum khuitynyge iIeshch lezhenu, i puekhur khuitu kykhikhynu, zakhuagekpe ikpi khuefp amalkhemkpe lezhenu ikpi puekhunshagem kyshchakhumenu.
Detkhene zy tspykhum khuitynyge ipeshch zekhegezhynsheu zekhuede puekhu papshchpe zekhuede lezhapshchpe kratynu.

Detkhene zy tspykhum khuitynyge ipeshch ezyri i unagueri tspykhum khuefeshchen pseukpe ipeu zygepseun, shchykhueim dezh zylypesyfynu sotsialne khumenygekhemkpe shchpegebydaue zy pseukpe amal kezytyn zy lezhapshchpe khuefp kyperykhenu.
Detkhene zy tspykhum khuitynyge ipeshch ezym i fpage papshchpe khase (profsoyuz, sendike) zekhishenu, apkhuede zekhesham khykhenu, khetynu.
24-ne pychygue

Detkhene zy tspykhum khuitynyge iIeshch zigepesekhunu, i negu zrigeuzhynu, psom khuemydeu i lezhegue ppaler tspykhu khuefashche shchapkhem itu kykhuagepsynu, ppale genekhuakpe i lezhapshchperi krature gepsekhuakpue dekpynu.
25-ne pychygue

Detkhene zy tspykhum khuitynyge iIeshch ezyri i unagueri uzynshen, tkhegue khuefashche ipeu pseun papshchpe shkhynygue, fashche, une ikpi meditsinske depepykunyge iguetynu. Kheti khuitynyge ipeshch, puekhunshage, symadzhage, khukuage, lpyguabage, fyzabage, zhyge ikpi ezym imypeshchpage puekhuguekhem kykhekp amalynshage, tkhemyshchkpage kylysu shchytme kyshchakhumenu, kragelynu.

Anekhemre sabiykhemre khuitynyge yapeshch khekhaue kykpelyplynkheu, kydepepykunkheu. Zerysha zelp-zefyz i bynui zemyshchkhegusekhem kalkhuaui shchyrret, saby psomi ya zekhuedeu, zekhegezhynsheu khuageshchkheper a zy sotsialne kekhumenyge amalkher.
26-ne pychygue

Detkhene zy tspykhur khuitshch gesenyge zerigeguetynu. Gesenyger, nekh mashchpe dydeu kapshchteme ikpi labzhe gesenyger akhshensheshch. Peshchpedze gesenyger zumygepenkIe amal zimyIeue egezygueshch. Tekhnike ikpi peshchpage gesenyger kheti khuzepukhagenushch. Ipshche gesenyger zekhegezhynsheu kheti khuzepukhaue shchytyn khueishch ezym i senaush (talant) elytaue.

Gesenyger tspykhum i tspykhugem ikuu zrigeuzhynym khuefpyu gepsaue ikpi tspykhu khuefashchekhemre khuitynyge nekhyshchkhekhemre khuashchp shchpykhyr, lytenyger igeleshchynym, shchpigebydenym khueunetpaue shchytyn khueishch. Gesenygem tspykhukher khushchpigekun khueishch rase psomi, lepk psomi, din gup psomi ya zekhuakum gulyte, zegurypue, zekhuefpnyge, zenybzheguge delynu ikpi mamyrnyger kikhumen papshchpe Duneipso Keral Zegukhenygem irigekpuekp lezhygem zrigeuzhu shchytyn khueishch.
Sabiykhem irageguetynu gesenyger zykhuedenur kykhezykhynu khuityr, psom yaperaue i ane-adershch.
27-ne pychygue
Kheti khuitynyge iIeshch tsIykhubem i shchpenkhabze gashchpem khuitu nykhykhenu, guazdzher zykhuigeshchkhepenu, shchpenyge zyuzhynygem khetynu ikpi ar zykhuigeshchkhepenu.
Kheti khuitynyge ipeshch ezym kigeshchpa shchpenyge, zhabze (literature), guazdzhe peshchpagekhem mylkuu, pshchpeue, shchpykhue kypekpueu khuar kykhuakhumenu.
28-ne pychygue
Kheti khuefashcheshch my dzhepsalem kyshchykheshch tspykhu khuefashchekhemre khuitynygekhemre shchagezeshchpefynu zy sotsialne ikpi duneipso gepsykpe sisteme shchypenu.
29-ne pychygue
Kheti ezym i tspykhugem khuitu ikpi ikuu zrigeuzhynu amal kezyt tspykhube zhylaguemi keralmi khuishchpezhypkhe pshcherylkher ipeshch.

Kheti i khuefashchekher zyshchykhuigeshchkhepekpe ikpi i khuitynygekher shchyzerikhekpe, negueshchpkhem ya khuefashchekhemre ya khuitynygekhemre khuegepezhyn, abykhem shchpykh, lytenyge kykhuegeshchpyn ikpi demokraticheske zhylaguem zedashchte shchenkhabzer (etiker), zhylague gepsykper, shchypekper egefpekpuenym i amalkher kekhuma khun papshchpe khekhaue keral khabzekpe genekhua gunapkekhem epkhaue shchytshch.
Daui irrekhu, my tspykhu khuefashchekhemre khuitynygekhemre zykhuebgeshchkhepe, zepkhe khunukym Duneipso Keral Zegukham i guryl-guryshchpekhemre i bzypkhekhemre (printsipkhemre) kemyzegyu.
30-ne pychygue

My dzhepsalem kykhiubyde detkhene zy khabze geuvar zygurybgapue khunukym myby kyshchipuetykpa khabze geuvakhem shchyshch guer ipetynu, iukuenu detkhene zy kerali, gupi, nerybgi khuitynyge irit khuedeu.
